text: Tema (meaning Theme in English) was a weekly social and political magazine based in Bulgaria. It was one of the influential magazines in the country and was in circulation from 2001 to 2015. ==History and profile== Tema was first published in September 2001. Modeled on Time and Newsweek the magazine covered news, current affairs and investigative journalism work. The publisher was United Free Media. Its sister publication was the daily paper Преса (meaning Presa in English). In 2011 the Bulgarian Ministry of Transport, Information Technology and Communications issued a stamp for Tema's tenth anniversary. Tema as well as Преса were both closed down on 31 July 2015 due to financial problems. ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:2001 establishments in Bulgaria Category:2015 disestablishments in Bulgaria Category:Bulgarian-language magazines Category:Defunct magazines published in Bulgaria Category:Defunct political magazines Category:Magazines established in 1998 Category:Magazines disestablished in 2015 Category:Magazines published in Bulgaria Category:Weekly magazines
title: Tema (magazine)
